name: Signature Portrait
description: A personal, intentional session focused on capturing you as you are. Clean, refined imagery shaped with care and attention through my point of view.

name: Couples & Engagement
description: An experience centered on connection, presence, and shared moments, allowing your relationship to unfold naturally.

name: Maternity
description: An intimate session created for expecting parents, honoring this experience with intention and care.
notes: Additional individuals may join for an added fee.

name: Newborn
description: A calm, thoughtful session focused on parents and immediate family (children and pets), capturing the tenderness of early moments.
notes: Extended family welcome for an added fee.

name: Family
description: A storytelling session designed to preserve connection and togetherness for immediate family.
notes: Extended family welcome for an added fee.

name: Professional & Personal Branding
description: Intentional imagery for individuals and brands seeking photographs that feel authentic, aligned, and human.

name: Custom Events
description: Baby showers, birthdays, corporate gatherings, holidays, and milestone celebrations.
requirements: An in-person or online consultation is required to ensure the experience reflects what matters most to you.
